Date Aired: 9/12/2025 Featuring: Aerial delivery technician Ben Schmidt & host Alie Reetz Guests: Ben Schmidt is an aerial delivery technician at Pierce Manufacturing.Alie Reetz is a marketing associate at Pierce Manufacturing.  Resources: Apparatus trainingPierce PartsProduct supportFirefighter training podcastAscendant tower overview podcastMaintenance and service trainingPierce Parts & product supportProduct supportDealer [...] Send us a text Introducing Pierceâ„¢ Dispatch! From fire apparatus, tools, and technology to firetruck equipment, trends and processes. Pierceâ„¢ Dispatch offers a unique perspective on what it takes to succeed on the front lines of firefighting. Hosted by Pierce Manufacturing representatives and featuring fire apparatus and equipment experts and fire service professionals as guests, the Pierce Dispatch echoes the timely and relevant information often found in the firefighter field communications. This show is for firefighters, apparatus dealers, fire service professionals, fire department administrators, municipal stakeholders, and anyone who wants to learn more about the fire industry. data.title: PIERCE OF MIND PODCAST - Apple Podcasts
data.snippet:
06/24/2025

### Joint Chats #5: I need a cuddle buddy.

In this episode of Joint Chats, Mathew Pierce shares his thoughts on Father's Day, reflecting on its significance compared to Mother's Day. He discusses the joys and challenges of homeownership, including his newfound love for Home Depot. Mathew also highlights the uplifting power of music in transforming his day and shares heartfelt stories about his pets, emphasizing the emotional connections they bring. As he navigates personal growth and potential changes in his living situation, he reflects on the joy and nostalgia that his dogs provide.

## Ratings & Reviews

### My Big Brother

01/27/2022

my brothers keeper 84 [...] 07/11/2025

### Joint Sessions 8: The Moment That Shook Me

In this heartfelt conversation, Mathew Pierce reflects on his feelings of loss and regret regarding his estranged daughter, the challenges of facing financial instability and health issues, and the importance of embracing vulnerability and personal growth. He shares his journey of self-discovery, the pain of missing out on important moments in his daughter's life, and the realization that healing and growth come with their own set of challenges. Mathew emphasizes the need for self-acceptance and kindness towards oneself and others as he navigates through life's complexities.

07/05/2025

### JOINT SESSIONS 7: I want to be in Onderland [...] 06/28/2025

### Joint sessions 6: The old me is dead

In this episode, Mathew Pierce shares his personal struggles with health, relationships, and self-identity. He reflects on his journey of transformation, the challenges of communication in relationships, and the importance of taking responsibility for one's actions. Mathew discusses his weight loss journey, the fears he faces regarding his health, and the significance of love and connection in life. Through candid storytelling, he emphasizes the need for personal growth and the value of expressing love to those around us.

06/24/2025

### Joint Chats #5: I need a cuddle buddy.

data.title: Pierce vs Maguire - Podcast
data.snippet:
### Episode 15. (Prince) Andrew Ruins It For Royal Rent

How much should the Royals pay in rent for their stately homes? Wouldn't have been an issue until Mr Mountbatten Windsor cosied up to paedophile Epstein and now a committee of MPs wants to scrutinise all royals paying peppercorns for Palaces. Also in this episode, they think its OBR, it is now - how long can Rachel survive.? The anti semitic rhetoric of Corbyn and Sultanas new left wing Your Party, unless You're Jewish, we presume. And Andrew gets a lesson on Elf on the Shelf, that's Pierce not Windsor!

## Ratings & Reviews

### Favourite podcast

04/10/2025

Cody8970

A great podcast, just wish it could be longer!

### Great Podcast

02/10/2025

jao21nicu [...] 8 JAN

### Episode 19. Trumpâ€™s War - Everywhere

The Presidentâ€™s hardline on immigration and crime has blown up into civil unrest in Minneapolis after an ICE agent shot dead a woman driver he claimed was trying to run him over. Itâ€™s been a news packed week for Trump, much played out on the international stage so we ask has Donald gone too far or is this just the New World order?. Greenland, which is rarely green and mainly ice white, is the latest tick on the US shopping list and what a dilemma this poses for Sir Keir and his dance card with the White House. Happy New Year, please enjoy an absorbing 40 minutes with the two best political podcasters in the business, not afraid to give opinion, they go where others fear to tread and always ready to prick the Westminster bubble

22/12/2025 [...] 22/12/2025

### Episode18. Who's Been Naughty Or Nice?

Sorry for the thumbnail, this is what you get when you ask AI to create a Pierce vs Maguire Xmas image! World domination by big tech is a while off. This is our bumper Christmas report card on the heroes and villains, the legends and losers, the prize recipients of another astonishing year at Westminster, Royal Lodge and Mar-a-Lago, all with no punches pulled. And thanks for you support since our launch just four months ago, last week Pierce vs Maguire was hovering just outside the top ten politics podcasts in the UK. We never forget you have a choice but none of the others are as funny, outspoken nor as well informed as these two Santa's little helpers.

17/12/2025

### Episode 17. Should Medics Lose The Right To Strike?

data.title: Best Pierce-centric episodes? : r/community - Reddit
data.snippet:
r/community icon

# Best Pierce-centric episodes?

Hello lovely people, happy new year to you all.

I watched the Chevy documentary, and it made me a bit sad.

Whatever my thoughts are on Chevy, I love Pierce as a character. Rather than doing, like, my 20th rewatch of the series I wondered if you could recommend (in your opinions) your favourite Pierce-centric episodes for me to re-watch?

For me the D&D episode is a clear stand-out. Ironically, so is the episode where they read out his will (even though he's not even in that episode!).

Which episodes would you suggest?

Thank you all.

# Related Answers Section
